attributes.action: Abolish The National Offender Management Service, and return to separate administrations for the Prison Service and the Probation Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This government has craftily slid the Prison Service together with the Probation Service, under the title National Offender Management Service. The idea was to reduce re-offending.
The reality was the reverse - "NOMS" has forced the Probation Service to operate as though it were a Prison Service in the community, and it has virtually ceased to be any help to offenders.
The rules for prisoners released to Probation Supervision are extraordinarily harsh, lean towards the punitive, and result in most offenders being breached and returned, arbitrarily, to prison.
So the prison population continues to rise, and ex-offenders get no help.
NOMS costs one billion pounds to run and makes the construction of yet more prisons inevitable.
